title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: Victoria Márquez-Mees is the first Chief Accountability Officer of the EBRD’s Independent Project Accountability Mechanism. The role reports to the Board of Directors. Profile of Sir Suma Chakrabarti who was EBRD President between 2012-2020

title: EBRD Board of Directors
snippet: Learn about the EBRD's journey to investing more than €210 billion in over 7,500 projects. ... Through projects, business services and involvement in high-level policy reform, we're doing more than ever before. ... We draw on three decades of regional knowledge and financial expertise to tailor our products and approaches to each client's needs.

title: EBRD Senior Leadership Group
snippet: Learn about the EBRD's journey to investing more than €210 billion in over 7,500 projects. ... Through projects, business services and involvement in high-level policy reform, we're doing more than ever before. ... We draw on three decades of regional knowledge and financial expertise to tailor our products and approaches to each client's needs. ... Our senior leadership group covers every aspect of the EBRD's business and advises the Executive Committee and President.

title: 2024 election of the EBRD President
snippet: Ms Renaud-Basso was first elected at the 2020 EBRD Annual Meeting. Following the 2024 election for the role, in which the candidate stood unopposed, she will be President until 2028.

title: Who we are
snippet: The EBRD was founded in 1991 to create a new post-Cold War era in central and eastern Europe, and has a unique political and financial mandate.
